name: Ruza
description:
• Unique combat system that let's you create and use custom attacks/spells during combat
  • Make tough moral decisions that will impact your party and the world around you
  • No random encounters, explore the world at your own leisure
  • Dark fantasy story
  • Heart-pumping OST that features genres like: Heavy Metal, Acid, Techno, Trance, DnB, Industrial
  • Animated cutscenes
  • Customize your party's gear and stats
  • Reindeers

Ruza is 100% free! Jump right in, what do you have to lose?
